attributes.additional_details: We would like to make it known that, we object to the closure of the Tea Gardens at keswick, as we believe there are plans afoot to extend the currently large keswick theatre next door,. We believe that this building and its services are iconic and of huge cultural interest to keswick, and has visitors fro all over the world. to destroy this heritage would amount to nothing more than cultural vandalism. This pettion is a note of objection to any plans to permanently clsoe the tea gardens.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
